plot outline: "Mungaru Male 2" is the sequel to 2006 Blockbuster "Mungaru Male". This romantic movie features Golden star Ganesh and Crazy star V.Ravichandran for the first time together along with newbie Neha shetty, Aindrita Ray, Shilpa Manjunath, Ravishankar, Sadhu kokila and others.
title: Mungaru Male 2
plot: Preetham, the son of a millionaire seeks excitement in every aspect of his life until he meets the unique and charming Nandini who changes his perspective and goes missing from his world.

"_Mungaru Male 2_ (qv)" is the sequel to 2006 Blockbuster "Mungaru Male". This romantic movie features Golden star Ganesh and Crazy star V.Ravichandran for the first time together along with newbie Neha shetty, Aindrita Ray, Shilpa Manjunath, Ravishankar, Sadhu kokila and others.::Team "_Mungaru Male 2_ (qv)"
